subject: Dogfighting
Cruelty to Animals
Football
lead_paragraph: More than 60 dogs seized from Michael Vick’s property have been sheltered in Surry, Va., and in kennels across several counties in southeastern Virginia since April.
snippet: More than 60 dogs seized from Michael Vick’s property have been sheltered in Surry, Va., and in kennels across several counties in southeastern Virginia since April.
